metadata.name: Renamed NirCmd.EXE Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of a renamed "NirCmd.exe" binary based on the PE metadata fields.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('nircmd.exe') AND NOT (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\nircmd.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\nircmdc.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of a renamed "NirCmd.exe" binary based on the PE metadata fields.
